title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-2.11 - Water supply
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 6-2.11 - Water supply

State Regulations

The water supply serving all plumbing fixtures, including drinking fountains, lavatories and showers, shall, after treatment, meet the applicable requirements of Part 5 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
6-2.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
